content.raw: Thank you for making the no roll cage version.  I just took a look and one thing that stood out to me was that the drive shaft bump in the middle of the floor is missing from the model.  I will add a couple of pictures to the issue for reference.  I can get measurements if that would be helpful as well.
content.html: Thank you for making the no roll cage version. I just took a look and one thing that stood out to me was that the drive shaft bump in the middle of the floor is missing from the model. I will add a couple of pictures to the issue for reference. I can get measurements if that would be helpful as well.
